PHRASE.LANG: Welcome to the seaside of tropical angels: blue seas, white sandy beaches and brilliant sunshine. Here you will find a place that reunties you with those fond summer memories. Colourful swimsuits are for sale!

Welcome to the seaside of tropical angels: blue seas, white sandy beaches and brilliant sunshine. Here you will find a place that reunties you with those fond summer memories. Colourful swimsuits are for sale!

Welcome to the seaside of tropical angels: blue seas, white sandy beaches and brilliant sunshine. Here you will find a place that reunties you with those fond summer memories. Colourful swimsuits are for sale!
トロピカルエンジェルたちが集まる海岸へようこそ。青い海、白い砂浜、ふりそそぐ太陽の光。ここにくれば、あなたの胸の奥にある「あの夏の思い出たち」に再会できるはず。色とりどりの「水着」発売中です！
열대지방의 천사들이 모이는 해변으로 어서 오십시오. 푸른 바다, 흰 모래 사장, 그리고 내리쏟아지는 햇살. 여기서는 당신의 가슴 속에 있는 「그 여름의 추억들」과 다시 만날 수 있습니다! 다양한 색상의 「수영복」 또한 발매 중입니다.

Welcome to the seaside of tropical angels: blue seas, white sandy beaches and brilliant sunshine. Here you will find a place that reunties you with those fond summer memories. Colourful swimsuits are for sale!
歡迎來到熱帶天使們眾集的海岸。藍色的海水、白色的沙灘，還有耀眼的太陽。只要來到這裡，必定可重溫藏在內心深處的「某個夏天的回憶」。色彩繽紛的泳衣熱賣中！
